thread.title: Constellation Advisers Names Jason Cholewa Vice President of Business Development

author: cnbc.com
title: Constellation Advisers Names Jason Cholewa Vice President of Business Development
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Constellation Advisers, LLC ("Constellation"), a premier investment management consultancy and an institutional level provider of compliance and operational infrastructure for investment management firms, announced that Jason Cholewa joined Constellation as Vice President of Business Development. He will be based in Constellation’s New York offices, and will focus on business development throughout the North Eastern region of the United States. With Mr. Cholewa joining the team, Constellation is furthering its commitment to becoming the premier services provider to the asset management industry and its related stakeholders.
“Over the last 10 years we have been growing and expanding our footprint in helping investment managers meet their operational objectives. Adding Jason to our team, given his experience and market presence, provides Constellation a significant advantage in reaching clients who are in need of an institutional level platform with best in class client service.” stated Boris Onefater, CEO of Constellation.
Mr. Cholewa joins Constellation after establishing ALPS’ East Coast operations and running its business development efforts in the private funds space. He has extensive experience with hedge funds, private equity, real estate funds and broker-dealers. He will lead the business development efforts on behalf of Constellation’s service offerings on the East Coast.
Commenting on his new role, Mr. Cholewa stated, "As an industry participant I have experienced firsthand the dedication and commitment that Constellation’s leadership has to being the best it can be in providing high quality, customized services to its clients. I am excited to join Constellation and to add to the firm’s impressive client base and leadership role within the investment management industry.”
"Jason will be a great addition to our business development team. We have succeeded in finding a seasoned industry professional who will prove to be not only highly impactful on the business development front, but also a great representative and team member for Constellation’s growing national practice." said Greg Farrington, President of Constellation.
ABOUT CONSTELLATION
Constellation Advisers, LLC is a premier investment management consultancy with a customized boutique firm approach. Founded in 2008, the firm draws from decades of experience in investment management and financial services. Constellation is the leading provider of startup advisory, outsourced CFO, accounting, operational, regulatory and compliance support services to a range of alternative and traditional investment management firms and their investors, including hedge funds, private equity, venture capital funds, family offices, mutual funds, fund of funds, among others. With its headquarters in New York and centers of excellence in San Francisco and Dallas, Constellation services over 300 clients across the United States and internationally.
